title: Looking to make/join a Ranked team and climb the ranks!
body:
Title says it all really.
Just transferred my account from NA server and am looking to kick ass in a ranked team on OCE.
Have been to Silver 5 before. 
Can play all roles but main Support.

Hit me up with a reply on this or add me on league. 
Username: SnapperScalez

Cheers

replies.body:
Hey Mate,

I am really keen to create or join a ranked team also i am mature and very competitive but love the game and know how to have fun.  I added you i can play all roles but mainly ADC TOP JUNGLE.
Yo added the both of you
Add me so we can play
mid main, in game atm add me
